verses.verse: He <WH376>, that being often reproved <WH8433> hardeneth <WH7185> <WH8688> his neck <WH6203>, shall suddenly <WH6621> be destroyed <WH7665> <WH8735>, and that without remedy <WH4832>.

When the righteous <WH6662> are in authority <WH7235> <WH8800>, the people <WH5971> rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799>: but when the wicked <WH7563> beareth rule <WH4910> <WH8800>, the people <WH5971> mourn <WH584> <WH8735>.

Whoso <WH376> loveth <WH157> <WH8802> wisdom <WH2451> rejoiceth <WH8055> <WH8762> his father <WH1>: but he that keepeth company <WH7462> <WH8802> with harlots <WH2181> <WH8802> spendeth <WH6> <WH8762> his substance <WH1952>.
The king <WH4428> by judgment <WH4941> establisheth <WH5975> <WH8686> the land <WH776>: but he <WH376> that receiveth gifts <WH8641> overthroweth <WH2040> <WH8799> it.
A man <WH1397> that flattereth <WH2505> <WH8688> his neighbour <WH7453> spreadeth <WH6566> <WH8802> a net <WH7568> for his feet <WH6471>.
In the transgression <WH6588> of an evil <WH7451> man <WH376> there is a snare <WH4170>: but the righteous <WH6662> doth sing <WH7442> <WH8799> and rejoice <WH8056>.
The righteous <WH6662> considereth <WH3045> <WH8802> the cause <WH1779> of the poor <WH1800>: but the wicked <WH7563> regardeth <WH995> <WH8799> not to know <WH1847> it.
Scornful <WH3944> men <WH582> bring <WH6315> a city <WH7151> into a snare <WH6315> <WH8686>: but wise <WH2450> men turn away <WH7725> <WH8686> wrath <WH639>.
If a wise <WH2450> man <WH376> contendeth <WH8199> <WH8737> with a foolish <WH191> man <WH376>, whether he rage <WH7264> <WH8804> or laugh <WH7832> <WH8804>, there is no rest <WH5183>.
The bloodthirsty <WH582> <WH1818> hate <WH8130> <WH8799> the upright <WH8535>: but the just <WH3477> seek <WH1245> <WH8762> his soul <WH5315>.
A fool <WH3684> uttereth <WH3318> <WH8686> all his mind <WH7307>: but a wise <WH2450> man keepeth <WH7623> <WH8762> it in till afterwards <WH268>.
If a ruler <WH4910> <WH8802> hearken <WH7181> <WH8688> to lies <WH1697> <WH8267>, all his servants <WH8334> <WH8764> are wicked <WH7563>.
The poor <WH7326> <WH8802> and the deceitful <WH8501> man <WH376> meet together <WH6298> <WH8738>: the YY <WH3068> lighteneth <WH215> <WH8688> both <WH8147> their eyes <WH5869>.
The king <WH4428> that faithfully <WH571> judgeth <WH8199> <WH8802> the poor <WH1800>, his throne <WH3678> shall be established <WH3559> <WH8735> for ever <WH5703>.
The rod <WH7626> and reproof <WH8433> give <WH5414> <WH8799> wisdom <WH2451>: but a child <WH5288> left <WH7971> <WH8794> to himself bringeth his mother <WH517> to shame <WH954> <WH8688>.
When the wicked <WH7563> are multiplied <WH7235> <WH8800>, transgression <WH6588> increaseht <WH7235> <WH8799>: but the righteous <WH6662> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> their fall <WH4658>.
Correct <WH3256> <WH8761> thy son <WH1121>, and he shall give thee rest <WH5117> <WH8686>; yea, he shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> delight <WH4574> unto thy soul <WH5315>.
Where there is no vision <WH2377>, the people <WH5971> perish <WH6544> <WH8735>: but he that keepeth <WH8104> <WH8802> the Torah <WH8451>, happy <WH835> is he.
A servant <WH5650> will not be corrected <WH3256> <WH8735> by words <WH1697>: for though he understand <WH995> <WH8799> he will not answer <WH4617>.
Seest <WH2372> <WH8804> thou a man <WH376> that is hasty <WH213> <WH8801> in his words <WH1697>? there is more hope <WH8615> of a fool <WH3684> than of him.
He that delicately bringeth up <WH6445> <WH8764> his servant <WH5650> from a child <WH5290> shall have him become his son <WH4497> at the length <WH319>.
An angry <WH639> man <WH376> stirreth up <WH1624> <WH8762> strife <WH4066>, and a furious <WH2534> man <WH1167> aboundeth in <WH7227> transgression <WH6588>.
A man's <WH120> pride <WH1346> shall bring him low <WH8213> <WH8686>: but honour <WH3519> shall uphold <WH8551> <WH8799> the humble <WH8217> in spirit <WH7307>.
Whoso is partner <WH2505> <WH8802> with a thief <WH1590> hateth <WH8130> <WH8802> his own soul <WH5315>: he heareth <WH8085> <WH8799> cursing <WH423>, and bewrayeth <WH5046> <WH8686> it not.
The fear <WH2731> of man <WH120> bringeth <WH5414> <WH8799> a snare <WH4170>: but whoso putteth his trust <WH982> <WH8802> in the YY <WH3068> shall be safe <WH7682> <WH8792>.
Many <WH7227> seek <WH1245> <WH8764> the ruler's <WH4910> <WH8802> favour <WH6440>; but every man's <WH376> judgment <WH4941> cometh from the YY <WH3068>.
An unjust <WH5766> man <WH376> is an abomination <WH8441> to the just <WH6662>: and he that is upright <WH3477> in the way <WH1870> is abomination <WH8441> to the wicked <WH7563>.
